name: Netflix Methods
description: Learn Netflix access techniques — EM invite and manual privatization methods available.
long_description:
Netflix Methods

Techniques to get Netflix access on your own terms.

Available Methods:
  - Netflix EM: Get an invite sent directly to your email without needing the owner's email access
  - Manual Privatize: Convert public Netflix cookies into private ones for longer-lasting access

Pricing:
  - Netflix EM: $1
  - Manual Privatize: $1.50

How It Works:
  - You receive a detailed step-by-step guide for the method you purchase
  - Each method is explained clearly so you can repeat it yourself
  - Support available if you get stuck during the process
requirements: Basic familiarity with Netflix cookies required. For EM method, you need a valid Netflix cookie to work with. Manual privatize works on public cookies to make them private and longer-lasting.

name: GPT Invite Method
description: Method to get ChatGPT Plus access by sending an invite to your own email. Step-by-step guide included.
long_description:
GPT Invite on Mail Method

Learn how to get ChatGPT Plus access by sending an invite directly to your own email.

What You Get:
  - Complete step-by-step method guide
  - Learn how to send a ChatGPT Plus invite to your email
  - Works through team-based plan cookies
  - Duration is luck-based — could be lifetime or short-term

Pricing:
  - Invite on Mail Method: $2

What You Need:
  - A team-based plan cookie or account
  - Your email address for receiving the invite

Note: This is a method guide — you learn the technique and do it yourself. Duration of access varies and is not guaranteed.
requirements: You need a team-based plan cookie or account. Duration is luck-based — could be lifetime or short-term, no guarantees. Your email address is required to receive the invite. This is a method guide, not a done-for-you service.

name: Spotify Methods
description: Spotify access methods — mail invite with accepting technique and C2P account conversion.
long_description:
Spotify Methods

Techniques for getting Spotify Premium access.

Available Methods:
  - Invite + Accepting Method: Full method to send and accept a Spotify Premium invite on your email
  - C2P (Change to Private): Convert the account's email to your own

Pricing:
  - Invite + Accepting Method: $4
  - C2P: $4

What You Need:
  - For Invite method: A family or duo owner-based cookie — prefer accounts that have never sent an invite before
  - For C2P: Any Spotify cookie works

You receive a step-by-step guide for the method you purchase. Support available if you need help.
requirements: For invite method: need a family or duo owner-based cookie, preferably from an account that has never sent an invite. For C2P: any Spotify cookie works. Basic cookie knowledge required.

name: Hotstar Method
description: Convert a Hotstar account to your own number using the C2P technique. Receipt template option available.
long_description:
Hotstar C2P Method

Convert a Hotstar account from the owner's number to your own number.

Available Options:
  - C2P without receipt template: Transfer ownership to your number
  - Receipt template only: Get a ready-made receipt template for Hotstar
  - C2P + Receipt template: Full method with template included

Pricing:
  - C2P (without receipt template): $4
  - Receipt template only: $5
  - Both (C2P + receipt template): $8

What You Need:
  - An Indian mobile number (mandatory)
  - Must be in India or using an India-based VPN
  - A Hotstar cookie to work with

Step-by-step guide provided with support if you need help.
requirements: Indian mobile number is mandatory. Must be located in India or using an India-based VPN. A valid Hotstar cookie is required to perform the C2P method.
price:
- C2P (without receipt template): $4
- Receipt template only: $5
- Both (C2P + receipt template): $8
